messages.TRMSG_PRE_BATTLE:
I wield the stupendous power of water!
Don’t think you can win!
messages.TRMSG_DEFEAT:
But the kid wins anyway!
I’m just bowled over!
messages.TRMSG_POST_BATTLE:
The water rising and falling is tricky,
but don’t let it annoy you.If you lose sight of yourself, that’s
when you’re set to lose.
